Whombat

Welcome!

Let's get started by creating your account. Provide your information and set up a secure password below.

This name will be used to identify you in the app.

Please provide your full name. This is especially helpful for sharing your annotations, ensuring correct attribution.

Provide a valid email address. While not displayed in the app, it helps others contact you regarding annotated data.

Create a strong password with at least 8 characters, including one number and one letter.

Enter the same password again.

Info

Your data is stored locally on your computer and is not sent to any server.
